item.title: PNO-V-90-017A:on 900406,three earthquakes felt in Walnut Creek area.Earthquakes not felt at GE facility & NTR reactor not operating at time of earthquake.No damage resulted.

item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Ack receipt of 820125 ltr informing NRC of steps taken to correct violations noted in IE Insp Rept 50-228/81-03. Requested date for completion of structural steel work acceptable.

item.title: Responds to NRC 811019 ltr re violations noted in IE Insp Rept 50-228/81-03.Corrective actions:main effort of redesigning shield & restacking blocks completed.Overall work will be completed by 820228.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Confirms telcon re changes in mgt of licensee resulting from upcoming retirement of H Simens,effective 930208.Author designated as new president of company & will remain as chairman of Board of Directors.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: PNO-V-90-022:on 900427,earthquake occurred in Northern California.Earthquakes not felt at GE facility & no observable effects to Region V ofc noted.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: PNO-V-90-019:on 900417,earthquakes measuring 4.6 on Richter Scale measured 3 miles west of Upland,CA.On 900418,three earthquakes occurred in northern California.No visual damage occurred to reactors in area.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)
